TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit X509BasicConstraintsExtension extends System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension
Public NotInheritable Class X509BasicConstraintsExtension Inherits X509Extension

summary.span: 定义对证书设置的约束。

span.span: Defines the constraints set on a certificate.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供对证书设置定义的基本约束的属性。This class provides properties that define the basic constraints set on a certificate. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何打开用户的个人证书存储并在存储区中显示有关每个证书的信息。The following code example demonstrates how to open a user’s personal certificate store and display information about each certificate in the store. 此示例使用类来显示信息。This example uses the class to display the information. span.span: if the certificate has a restriction on the number of path levels it allows, otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 证书颁发者可以限制证书路径中的级别的数。A certificate issuer can restrict the number of levels in a certificate path. 此属性指示证书是否具有此限制。This property indicates whether the certificate has this restriction. 如果此值为`true`，你可以使用属性来确定允许的级别数。If this value is `true`, you can use the property to determine the number of levels allowed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何打开用户的个人证书存储并在存储区中显示有关每个证书的信息。The following code example demonstrates how to open a user’s personal certificate store and display information about each certificate in the store. 此示例使用类来显示信息。This example uses the class to display the information. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/VB/sample.vb#1)]

span.span: The extension cannot be decoded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果证书具有的约束，它允许路径级别数，此属性将指示允许多少个级别。If a certificate has a constraint on the number of path levels it allows, this property indicates how many levels are allowed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何打开用户的个人证书存储并在存储区中显示有关每个证书的信息。The following code example demonstrates how to open a user’s personal certificate store and display information about each certificate in the store. 此示例使用类来显示信息。This example uses the class to display the information.
